text: Trump’s letting CEOs speak so they can praise him. They’re all applauding him. One by one. This is sickening. This is corruption. Free advertising for the companies using the coronavirus as cover. I wonder how much they’ll donate to Trump’s campaign. #WeWantDrFauciDailyBriefings
